Description: The overall design of the dataset or file.
The url of where the file is stored.
The assay the file is representative of.
The processing level the file can be mapped to.
The species the data was collected on. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
The tumor type(s), if applicable, of the data collected. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
Tissue type(s) associated with the file. Multiple values permitted, comma separated.
The denormalized manifest for file submission.
A unique primary key that enables record updates using schematic.
